title: Yitwa Etienne Gatanazi Cg #StevenGatanazi ku bibaza impamvu atiswe atyo akihitiramo #Etienne benshi muzi nka Gitefano . Akenshi nzajya nkwibukira ku kuba wisanzura uko ubishoboye ariko kdi inama zawe zo zirenga kuba ingenzi! Uyu ari muri bake barenze amateka yaranze urwa Gasabo akihitiramo kumva ko ari umunyarwanda kdi agafata abanyarwanda kimwe ! Byinshi ngufiteho sinabivuga bitamfatanya n’amarangamutima . Aha Ni umwanya wo kuvuga ngo #Umunsi mukuru/mwiza w’amavuko kuri wowe Etienne Gatanazi umukiga tuziranye duhuzwa ,tugahuza tukanahurira kuri byinshi mu rugendo rw’ubuzima. Cyo komeza umererwe neza rero Rurema nawe ndamwizeye arakomeza yagure intambwe zawe muri byose byinshi kdi byiza! Ejo ni heza. #Tsinda/Tsinda Umwana Wa Sobukwe na nyokobukwe Sharon AKA #Gorillos* ndamwizeye ku munsi nk’uyu akibagiza ntiyakabura hafi aho Encore Joyeux Anniversaire kuri Etienne Gatanazi 🎂🧁🍺🍷🍻 Umunyamakuru w’igihangange tuziranye!
author: Eric-Bagiruwubusa

title: Waba warigeze ukinaho umupira w’amaguru witwaga #Karere? Ni iki mu byo wawukundiraga Cg icyabaye muri kuwukina utazibagirwa? title:
Twibukiranye: NGARAMA NA SARUHARA RWA NKOMOKOMO
---------------------------------------
Kera Habayeho umuntu akitwa Ngarama, akaba n'umugaragu w'umwami. Muri icyo gihe hariho igisiga kinini kikitwa Saruhara rwa Nkomokomo.

Abantu bari barakigize indahiro. Cyagiraga amaboko cyane, kikabuza umwami guturwa. Cyabonaga abafite amakoro kikabica, ibintu byabo kikabirya.

Umwami agira umujinya, agiteza ingabo ngo zizacyice. Ingabo zirahaguruka, zijya kwica Saruhara rwa Nkomokomo. Saruhara imanuka hejuru izica zose. Umwami arongera ayiteza ingabo, Saruhara na zo irazitsemba, ntihasigara n'umwe wo kubara inkuru. Amayira arasiba, ntihagira usubira kugera ibwami. Bose batinyaga Saruhara.

Bukeye…
author: Eric-Bagiruwubusa

Mperutse kumva amakuru n’ibiganiro abantu batandukanye bavuga ukuntu bungukiye byinshi muri gahunda ya #Gumamurugo! Hanze yo guseka, kwimyoza n’ibindi byanteye no kwibaza byinshi Etienne Gatanazi Janvier Popote Nshimyumukiza Theodomir Jean Claude Nkubito Oswald Niyonzima Oswald Oswakim II Alphonse Twahirwa Twahirwa
